h1: How Many Calories in a Little Caesars Pizza?

quick_answer.text: A large Little Caesars Classic Cheese Pizza has about 2280 calories and 104 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one slice of Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: About 285 kcal per slice for a large classic cheese pizza (1/8 of whole).

faqs.q: What are the macros for a Little Caesars cheese pizza?
faqs.a: Per large pizza: 280 g carbs, 104 g protein, 88 g fat.

faqs.q: How does pepperoni affect calories in Little Caesars pizza?
faqs.a: Adds ~40 kcal per slice or 320 kcal total for a large pepperoni pizza.

faqs.q: Is Little Caesars pizza high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, a large classic has ~4960 mg sodium, mostly from cheese and sauce.

faqs.q: Calories in Little Caesars thin crust pizza?
faqs.a: Lower than classic; ~1920 kcal for a large cheese thin crust vs. 2280 for regular.
